title: Here we will generate example data that we will use in the rest of the course, we do it with help of Rocksdb

paragraphs.text: Rocksdb is built in into Kafka, see RocksDB configuration in Kafka.

Used for storage to serve for example the rest server.
It is made by Facebook and donated open source.
The data in Kafka is stored in Kafka, but intermediate in streaming apps, some data needs to be statefull accesible.
If internal memory is not enough, rocksdb is used.
Normally not visible for us but good to know.
Rocksdb databases can de deleted, Kafka restores them automatic out of it's own data in the Kafka topics

We use it here outside Kafka, to prepare the data.
  • Cars : we generate card from a csv file.
  • We generate Persons
  • We generate registrations (persons linked to a car)
And then we feed Kafka with cars, persons and registrations accoring to Domain Driven Design
